ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Arrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Since Shamans also get that spell it can be bought. So the runes are only good for raising research skill /Thoul De Seilinn
ygData.messageBody:
Since Shamans also get that spell it can be bought.
So the runes are only good for raising research skill

/Thoul De'Seilinn

Trevor Myler wrote:

> From: "Trevor Myler" <tmyler@...>
>
> Arrest is the 3rd rune needed for the lvl 34 Nullify Magic spell (along with
> Consumption and Sorcery).
>
> Sophist
>
